QuestData.Title: The Egg Lives On
QuestData.LogDescription: Wait as Rhea retrieves the egg from the Hidden Clutch.
QuestData.RewardText: You were not the only mortal that Rheastrasza confided in. I too earned the dragon's trust.$b$bI have already moved the real purified egg on to a safer location, away from the Badlands. It will continue to grow, out of Deathwing's sight.$b$bThe red dragonflight is as benevolent as it is powerful. It was Rheastrasza's final wish that I give this to you.
